posts.text: Note：Dva 爱你哦~本站地址：http://syjsxxjy.github.io/note/托管于github上，国内部分地区可能访问缓慢或者无法访问,请使用科学上网。 git larg file https://git-lfs.github.com/ 最近更新:2019.2.6 Dva，爱你哦~2018.7.13 不知道怎么弄评论，蓝瘦，香菇 这评论到底该怎么用。。。 1234567891011121314151617<!-- gitment --><div id="container"></div><link rel="stylesheet" href="https://imsun.github.io/gitment/style/default.css"><script src="https://imsun.github.io/gitment/dist/gitment.browser.js"></script><script>var gitment = new Gitment({ id: 'location.href', // 可选。默认为 location.href owner: 'syjsxxjy', repo: 'gitment-repo', oauth: { client_id: 'f2bc55c40bfa09795740', client_secret: '0629dd98d297397dea22df9d486ec7708b6f74ed', },})gitment.render('container')</script><!-- gitment -->

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
